meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Frankie Lynne Shea Zellweger Joyce Hshieh Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7182.

td.p: Frankie Lynne, a grant writer from Atlanta, Georgia
Shea Zellweger, a minister from Kansas City, Missouri
Joyce Hshieh, an actress and writer from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,201)

tr.td: THE CALDECOTT MEDAL
WARS
ECON 101
HEY "EU"!
BREAKUP
MAKEUP
